channel.title: Motivation on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Motivation on PR

item.title: Book recommendation : Creativity Inc by Ed Catmull
item.description: It is no surprise that you know about Pixar if you are even remotely knew Steve Jobs and his history. And you definitely heard about Pixar’s movies Toy story, Finding Nemo, Wall-E, Up & more.

item.title: Some funniest moments from my appraisal
item.description: I had my one-on-one meeting for 2012-13 appraisal this week. I was disappointed with the feedback given to me. Well, I have been _work_ing for very long time, and I know if you are not hurt then it is not an appraisal.

item.title: Project Dumps
item.description: Wish you all a very happy new year! It is 2013, another chance for us/me to start a new beginning. I believed in Mayan so much, I never had a plan post 20th Dec 2012 :)

item.title: Randy Pausch Last Lecture: Achieving Your Childhood Dreams
item.description: Content requires Javascript to be enabled. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ji5_MqicxSo p.noscript{ background-color: #fefea0; border-left: 4px solid #fea0a0; padding: 0 0.25em; } Youtube - Randy Pausch Last Lecture | Achieving Your Childhood Dreams

item.title: Resolutions for 2012
item.description: For the first time in history, I am publishing resolution list online, let see if this helps. Shed at least 5kg weight The iPhone4s which can’t resist myself from buying should be the last gadget for the year.

item.title: Idea to action: Tile this
item.description: Not many of my ideas are converted to a project, this one has seen its light last week. Though I haven’t completed all the UI and features of my original vision, it is better to have one working idea than nothing.

item.title: We are the Champions
item.description: After all the hiccups over years, we were able to witness the ultimate glory of bring back the cup to India after 28 years.

item.title: Idea Vault: When is that?
item.description: I guess like me there will be many people often confuse appointments/client calls due to timezone differences. I am not talking about people who send/receive schedules from Outlook (or similar apps).

item.title: Mac App Store - Source
item.description: You get the idea? You are not looking for the UI code are you? Saurik will be doing the UI for us ;)

item.title: iPhone – Accessibility
item.description:
What if iPhone provides an accessibility option for users with bigger finger?
I found that pinch to zoom and screenshot capturing can be considered as good photo cropping tool.

item.title: Steve Jobs - Stanford Commencement Address
item.description: Steve Jobs - Standford commencement address 2005. Jobs at his best. Content requires Javascript to be enabled.
